On Sat, Jun 30, 2007 at 02:44:48PM -0500, Scott Berry wrote:
> Also there is a 
> Debian packager Mario if he is on the list I would like to hear his 
> experiences.

He was on here at one point, but the last post I recall seeing from
him a while back stated that he was leaving, since he felt there was
too much off-topic traffic here.

Greg
